game_description: You can score points by hitting the flying arrows according to the colors, and you can enjoy the game by expressing the dance moves. Difficulty levels make the game easy to play, and more difficult levels will give you a lot of fun. ‚ñ† Secured the best K-POP music license -BTS, BLACKPINK, TWICE, PSY, ITZY, etc. -3 difficulty levels: EASY, NORMAL, HARD ‚ñ† Apply real dance moves to the game -Apply choreography to become a key point ‚ñ† Easy UI configuration and intuitive expression -Comfortable design at a glance ‚ñ† More than 5 new music updates every month -Want new music? Apply through the community! ‚ñ† Global Leaderboard -Challenge the global ranking!

review_3: Exactly what the tile says. It‚Äôs got the old school colorful feel of a DDR arcade game with arrows to slash instead of step on! I love beat saber but this has a classic look to it that takes me back to when DDR was released and it comes with a lot more music I like than beat saber. I really hope this keeps getting updated with kpop, or even jpop and any other music would be great too! I‚Äôm glad I made this purchase!
review_4: Game has a nice collection of songs to play with. Different play skill levels helps you to work your way up in skills. Hopefully the developer will keep adding songs to this great game. Hours of fun for the whole family.
